mapper.insert: insert into AnnuitySavingBase (comNum, prdNum, comName, prdName, pnsnKindName, saleStart, prdtTypeName, avgPrftRate, dclsRate, guarRate, btrmPrftRate1, btrmPrftRate2, btrmPrftRate3, saleCom, dclsStart) values (#{comNum}, #{prdNum}, #{comName}, #{prdName}, #{pnsnKindName}, #{saleStart}, #{prdtTypeName}, #{avgPrftRate}, #{dclsRate}, #{guarRate}, #{btrmPrftRate1}, #{btrmPrftRate2}, #{btrmPrftRate3}, #{saleCom}, #{dclsStart})

insert into AnnuitySavingOption (comNum, prdNum, pnsnRecTrm, pnsnEnterAge, monPay, payPeriod, pnsnStartAge, pnsnRecAmt) values (#{comNum}, #{prdNum}, #{pnsnRecTrm}, #{pnsnEnterAge}, #{monPay}, #{payPeriod}, #{pnsnStartAge}, #{pnsnRecAmt})
